description: Nothing but rolls of newspaper, used as an improvised club.  Although it is easy to create, it is pretty fragile.
A smooth and sturdy staff with a leather-wrapped grip.  Normally this is used to control a band, it could be as a mace-like weapon if needed.
A smooth and sturdy staff with a leather-wrapped grip.  Light and well-balanced, it is surprisingly easy to handle.  Enhanced with extra grip, it makes the weapon deadlier.
An oddly shpaed wood looking like a rifle, is called a gunstock due to its shape and useage of it.  Was used by Native Americans.  Also have a sharp point to pick some brains out.
A rock tied to some kind of rope, you can use this in an emergency.

A mass of scrap metal crudely beat into shape, with folded rags underneath to protect the wearers knuckles.  A good, quick weapon - but you have to get within punching range to use it.  An integrated tazer will make the job easier, by shocking the enemies.  Activate to skock them.

use_action.msg: You turn the shock knuckles on.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The shock knuckles' batteries are dead.

use_action.msg: You turn the shock knuckles off.

description: Folded camp chair, now bound with duct tape to use it as a weapon.  Somehow it is much lighter than the original.
The karambit is a small Indonesian curved knife resembling a claw.  It is one of the weapons commonly used in pencak silat and Indonesian martial arts.
A slender long rod of plastic cudgel, while traditionally intended as a tool for controlling traffic and people, it still makes a good melee weapon in a pinch.

use_action.msg: You turn the light baton on.
You turn the light baton off.

description: A model knife, made out of wood.  Still a good weapon if needed, but will not last for long.
A smooth and sturdy staff with a leather-wrapped grip.  This could be as a mace-like weapon if needed.

use_action.msg: You re-grab your scrap trench knife, to use it as a knuckleduster.
You re-grab your scrap trench knife, to use it as a knife.

description: This is a military combat axe.  It is light and extremely sharp, and could be deadly in either the right hands.
A baseball bat with several spikes driven through it, an excellent melee weapon.
A slender long rod of wood, while traditionally intended as a training tool for many dueling moves, it still makes a good melee weapon in a pinch.  Upgraded with nails.
Debug weapon.

A one-handed hatchet based on an acient tool.  Makes a great melee weapon, and is useful both for chopping things and smoking things.  Since it is also used as a smoking pipe, this is weaker than an average hatchet.
A one-handed bamboo hatchet.  Makes a great melee weapon, and is useful for chopping things.
A wood stake with the far end cut down into a stabbing point.
A leather hand and arm wrap incorporating metal blades over the knuckles to improve punching power and defence.
A rebar crudely beat into shape, with folded rebar underneath to protect the wearers knuckles.  A good, quick weapon - but you have to get within punching range to use it.
A handmade baseball bat made out of a log.  Well-balanced, but bit hard to wield.
This is a medieval weapon consisting of a steel shaft tipped with a steel spearhead. Heavy but useful.

Also called "lawyer Mr. Stun," this is a high-powered stungun.  Use this item to attempt to electrocute an adjacent enemy, damaging and temporarily paralyzing them.  Because the shock needs to be in direct contact, it is difficult to miss.

This is a rod mixed with high-powered stungun.  Use this item to attempt to electrocute an adjacent enemy, damaging and temporarily paralyzing them, then beating them up.  Because the shock needs to be in direct contact, it is difficult to miss.

use_action.msg: You turn the cattle prod on.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The cattle prod's batteries are dead.

use_action.msg: You turn the cattle prod off.

description: This is a classic looking medieval sword, in between the lighter arming sword and later two-handed swords in size.  It requires a larger baldric or scabbard, compared to smaller swords.
This is a short pole with a rock in a sock attached to it, based on the peasant flail except with a heavy, improvised head and made to thresh undead rather than grain.

This is a short stick with another stick attached to it by a long and flexible chain, makes the range longer than using only one stick.  Grab a yellow gym uniform with black lines and you could cosplay as that famous actor with an unique scream.
This is a short stick with another stick attached to it by a long and flexible rags, makes the range longer than using only one stick.  This one is handmade and is quite inferior.
A thin and flat glass knife made for throwing.  Its ineffective cutting edge, the material, and odd shape makes it unsuitable for use as a tool.
A black aluminum baseball bat, lighter than a wooden bat and a little easier to swing as a result.
A heavy beam, used in breaching fortifications.  This unwieldy tool is meant to break concrete, rock, brick, anything really.  The only drawback is that it is unwieldy and very, very heavy!

A stout rebar tonfa handmade by a survivor.  Originally an Okinawan weapon, it consists of a stick with a perpendicular handle with a spike attached a third of the way down its length.  Could use as an improvised axe if needed, like that tough guy from a korean webtoon.
A handle for a plasma sword.  Makes an excellent melee weapon when activated.  Activate to use this as a sword.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The plasma sword's batteries are dead.
use_action.msg: Your plasma sword activates.

description: A handle that collapses for easy storage, is now emitting a blade of plasma.  Makes an excellent melee weapon.  Activate to collapse.

use_action.msg: Your plasma sword deactivates.

description: A knuckle-like weapon, which could emit a blade of energy when activated.  Makes an excellent melee weapon when activated.  Activate to use this as a sword.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The plasma piercer's batteries are dead.
use_action.msg: Your plasma piercer activates.

description: A knuckle-like weapon, which emits a blade of energy now.  Makes an excellent melee weapon.  Activate to collapse.

use_action.msg: Your plasma piercer deactivates.

name: jitte
description: A pointed metal stick with a curved prong projecting from the handle.  It's primarily used for disarming opponents, and was used for enforcement in Japan.
This is a one-handed, single-edged sword of European origin, which are found in different forms.
This is a huge two-handed sword from Europe.  You're not quite sure it's supposed to be that bendy.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a huge two-handed sword from Europe.  It still packs a wallop.
This is a type of Ottoman knife or short sabre used from the mid-16th to late 19th century.  The curved shape gives the yatagan the ability to contact and cut objects faster than a straight sword.
This is a broad saber known for its unique shape.  This sword appears to be made very poorly, but it should still stand up to a few swings.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a broad saber known for its unique shape.
This is a huge two-handed sword from medieval era.  It packs a real wallop.
This is a huge two-handed sword from medieval era.  You're not quite sure it's supposed to be that bendy.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a huge two-handed sword from medieval era.  It still packs a wallop.

A remake of an ancient Chinese sword consisting of a curved blade and a guard with a cupped design.  Existing since the Shang dynasty, this one is made of steel.  One of the four major weapons in folklore, alongside the jian sword, qiang spear, and gun staff.
A japanese tool which is usually used as a trowel, also famously known as one of the "ninja weapons."  Could be used as a throwing weapon in an emergency.
This is a rare sword from Japan.  While it's got the right edge and weight, the pommel just snaps off, and you could study the blade with it from some anime.

snippet_category.text: An average looking katana with a black blade.
An average looking katana with a unique thunder like yellow stripes.
A saw shaped katana, as if someone broke the blade with a rock.
An average looking katana with a black body with a blue blade.
An average looking katana with a flaming red blade with a flame looking handguard.
A skinny katana with an extremly thin blade with a butterfly looking handguard.
A big, machete looking katana with a hole in the midddle of the orange blade.
A thin katana with a pink wobbly blade and a flower looking handguard.
A weird shaped katana with a white wavy blade like a snake.
A weird shaped katana with a reversed blade, so the blade part is actually dull and the dull part is a blade.
A simple looking katana with a white balde, white grip, and a golden handguard.  You are the storm.

description: Compared to an ordinary hunting knife, this double-edge sheath knife is more focused on combat rather than cutting and skinning game.
A thick tough steel blade with sawteeth on one side and a flat chisel tip for digging.  A tool for special operators or someone who likes tactical stuff.
This is a French style of machete.  Still, this is also good to use as a machete.
A medieval weapon recreated in the first world war consisting of a wood handle with a wire cable and a heavy iron end.  It is heavy, but its crushing damage is devastating.
A medieval weapon recreated in the first world war consisting of a wood handle with several spikes on it's head.  It is heavy, but its crushing damage is devastating.
This is a reproduction of huge, weirdly shaped, and two-handed sword from Korea.  It packs a real punch, but is quite unwieldy.
This is a curved sword originating in Eritrea and northern Ethiopia.  The curve on the blade varies from the Persian shamshir, adopting an almost semicircular shape.

This is a curved sword originating in Eritrea and northern Ethiopia.  The curve on the blade varies from the Persian shamshir, adopting an almost semicircular shape.  This sword appears to be made very poorly, but it should still stand up to a few swings.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a curved sword originating in Eritrea and northern Ethiopia.  The curve on the blade varies from the Persian shamshir, adopting an almost semicircular shape.
This is a pole axe, which makes you cleave your enemies easliy.
This is a pole axe, which makes you cleave your enemies easliy.  This polearm appears to be made very poorly, but it should still stand up to a few swings.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a pole axe, which makes you cleave your enemies easliy.
This is a sword designed specifically for decapitation used in 17th-century Europe.  Good for slashing, but quite unwieldy due to it's weight.
This is a sword designed specifically for decapitation used in 17th-century Europe.  This one seems oddly dull and worn.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a sword designed specifically for decapitation used in 17th-century Europe.

A sword with a flexible, whip-like blade, originating in modern-day Kerala in the Indian subcontinent.  Used in India, it was for fighting lot of people alone, by hurting them.  Zombies and heavily armoured opponents however, do need a different approach.
A fictional weapon that the ninjas would have used, although there is no evidence in history.  Activate to pull out the sword.

use_action.msg: You pull the ninjato out from the scabbard.

description: A fictional weapon that the ninjas would have used, although there is no evidence in history.  Smaller and lighter than a wakizashi, but still effective in combat.  Activate to put in the sword.

use_action.msg: You put the ninjato in the scabbard.

description: This is sword that was used by ancient Roman foot soldiers.  Still good to use, just like old times.
This is sword that was used by ancient Roman foot soldiers.  This one doesn't seem to have been made right.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of sword that was used by ancient Roman foot soldiers.
This is a replacement of Roman gladius, giving the infantry more reach when thrusting.
This is a replacement of Roman gladius, giving the infantry more reach when thrusting.  This one doesn't seem to have been made right.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a replacement of Roman gladius, giving the infantry more reach when thrusting.
A korean sword stick that some bandits would have used.  Activate to pull out the sword.

use_action.msg: You pull the changpo out from the scabbard.

description: A korean sword stick that some bandits would have used.  Smaller and lighter than an average sword, but still effective in combat.  Activate to put in the sword.

use_action.msg: You put the changpo in the scabbard.

description: A medieval dagger, normally used for parring, but still usable as the dagger itself.
This is a huge axe used in Egypt designed for warfare.  Though intended for use as a weapon, it can also be pressed into service as a clumsy woodcutting tool.
This is a huge axe used in Egypt designed for warfare.  You notice that the axe heads aren't seated properly at all.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a massive axe designed for warfare.
This is a huge axe used by the Vikings designed for warfare.  Though intended for use as a weapon, it can also be pressed into service as a clumsy woodcutting tool.
This is a huge axe used by the Vikings designed for warfare.  You notice that the axe heads aren't seated properly at all.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a huge axe used by the Vikings designed for warfare.
This is a huge axe used by the Vikings designed for warfare.  Though intended for use as a weapon, it can also be pressed into service as a clumsy woodcutting tool.
This is a huge axe used by the Vikings designed for warfare.  You notice that the axe heads aren't seated properly at all.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a massive axe designed for warfare.
This is a Japanese hand fan used as a weapon or for signalling.  Since this is folded, you could use this as a sap.  Activate this to open it up.

use_action.msg: You open your your war fan.

description: This is a Japanese hand fan used as a weapon or for signalling.  Since this is opened, you could use this as an unarmed weapon or as an improvised shield.  Activate this to fold it up.

use_action.msg: You fold up your war fan.

description: This is a fighting knife or dagger typical of the Germanic peoples of the Migration Period and the Early Middle Ages, especially the Saxons.
This is a weapon with a curved blade that was sharp on the inside edge used by the Thracians and Dacians.
This is a weapon with a curved blade that was sharp on the inside edge used by the Thracians and Dacians.  This sword appears to be made very poorly, but it should still stand up to a few swings.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a weapon with a curved blade that was sharp on the inside edge used by the Thracians and Dacians.
This is a length of chain with a lock and some steel scraps at the end with a grip on another, which could be used as an improvised weapon.

This is a length of chain with a lock and some steel scraps at the end with a grip on another, which could be used as an improvised weapon.  This one have an extra length of chain with more steel which gives more damage to the user's enemies.
This is a type of war hammer that has a very long spike on the reverse of the hammer head.  Sadly, you do have the pick but not the horse.

This is a unique melee weapon featuring a sturdy matte black long and slim single-edged blade with a spear-point and a distinctive slip-resistant grip which can also be used to affix it to a suitable firearm.  Originally manufactured for an assassin.
A pipe with some steel scraps attatched to it.  The resulting weapon is unwieldy and slow but very heavy hitting.
A stout metal pole with a sharp point.
This is sword that was used by ancient Roman foot soldiers.  Still good to use, just like old times.
This is sword that was used by ancient Roman foot soldiers.  This one doesn't seem to have been made right.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of sword that was used by ancient Roman foot soldiers.

This is a large, two-handed pickhead axe normally used by firefighters.  It makes a powerful melee weapon, but is a bit slow to recover between swings.  Better than the original, with rubber ergonomic grips and balanced handle.
A long strip of plastic with a handle on each end.  Originally developed for physical workout, it could be used for an improvised whip in a pinch.

This is a knife or dagger with an aftermarket modification to electrify the blade.  The makeshift atomic battery means it will effectively never run out of power, but it can irradiate the wielder when damaged.
This is a traditional Japanese weapon that consists of a sickle on a metal chain with a heavy iron weight at the end.  You are grabbing the sickle's handle, to use it as a sickle.

use_action.msg: You re-grab your kusarigama, to use it as a flail.

description: This is a traditional Japanese weapon that consists of a sickle on a metal chain with a heavy iron weight at the end.  You are grabbing the chain, to use it as a whip with a metal end.

use_action.msg: You re-grab your kusarigama, to use it as a sickle.

description: A typical microphone used to record or amplify voice.  Comes with a clip.  Has a 3-pin XLR connector on the bottom in order to connect to am amp.  Could be used as a weapon or a noisemaker if needed.

use_action.use_message: You make some noise using your microphone.

description: A unique microphone used to record or amplify voice, integrated teleporter makes you to swap with an 'audience.'  Comes with a clip.  Has a 3-pin XLR connector on the bottom in order to connect to am amp.  Could be used as a weapon if needed.
A conducting baton used to send signals to various musicians during a musical show.  Could be used as a weapon, change the posture to give different buffs, or could speed up your allies if needed.

use_action.msg: You change the position of the concducting baton.

description: A conducting baton used to send signals to various musicians during a musical show.  Could be used as a weapon, change the posture to give different buffs, or could return your allies some stamina if needed.

use_action.msg: You change the position of the concducting baton.

description: A conducting baton used to send signals to various musicians during a musical show.  Could be used as a weapon, change the posture to give different buffs, or could return your allies some power if needed.

use_action.msg: You change the position of the concducting baton.

description: This is a cordless battery-powered drill with a selection of drill bits.  It is turned on, so it could be used as a weapon if needed.

use_action.msg: You turn the drill off.

description: This is a rare sword from Korea.  Deadly against unarmored targets, and still very effective against armor.
This is a rare sword from Korea.  While it's got the right edge and weight, the pommel just snaps off, and the blade seems pretty worn.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a rare sword from Korea.
This is a finely crafted knife from Korea.  Useful as a tool, but not recommended as a weapon.
This is an exotic Chinese weapon, traditionally associated with northern Chinese martial arts.  Known for it's unique shape.

This is an exotic Chinese weapon, traditionally associated with northern Chinese martial arts.  Known for it's unique shape.  This sword appears to be made very poorly, but it should still stand up to a few swings.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of an exotic Chinese weapon, traditionally associated with northern Chinese martial arts.  Known for it's unique shape.
This stout combat knife features a nice design.  Ain't useful as a modern combat knife, this still hurts people.  Or zombies.
This is a medieval weapon consisting of a sword blade stuck with a long staff.
This is a medieval weapon consisting of a sword blade stuck with a long staff.  The head seems to be pretty dull, and the whole thing feels poorly made.
This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a medieval weapon consisting of a sword blade stuck with a long staff.
This is a stout shovel.  It's commonly used by military forces and favored by hikers for digging.  This was a popular weapon during WW1.  Could be used for multiple purposes.
A custom 3D-printed knuckles made out of carbon fiber.  It is more lightweight than a normal weapon thanks to its method of manufacturing, but it can only be repaired using a 3D printer.
A one-handed pickaxe.  Makes a great melee weapon, and is useful both for digging things and for use as a hammer.
